esophageal_imaging.title: Multiparametric MRI radiomics predicts neoadjuvant response in esophageal squamous cell carcinoma
esophageal_imaging.key_findings: Baseline multiparametric radiomics combined with clinical stage improved prediction of pathologic complete response to chemoradiotherapy.
